activities: Involta provides conditioned datacenter space to a client who, in turn, provides datacenter services to business units within its corporation, including the United Kingdom.  Conditioned space includes power, temperature, humidity and physical access controls.
personaldata: Involta does not process client or customer data, either on-line or manually.  Involta provides conditioned space.
recoursemech:
Involta has documented methods for registering an issue and resolving it and also has contracts which include specific reference to dispute resolution under the laws of Linn County, Iowa;
BBB EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution
